attributes.title: Privileged Access Detection
attributes.description: Detects anomalous privileged access activity in the Windows, Linux and Okta logs.

config.description: Detects unusually high special logon events initiated by a user.

detectors.detector_description: High count of special logon events

config.description: Detects a spike in privileged commands executed by a user.
